mapper.select: select a.article_id, a.cat_id, a.code, a.title, a.author, a.author_email, a.keywords, a.article_type, a.is_open, a.add_time, a.file_url, a.open_type, a.link, a.description, a.store_id, a.article_images, a.video_url, a.goods_id, a.cha_id from hai_article a left join hai_article_cat c on a.cat_id = c.cat_id where a.store_id = #{store_id} and c.code = #{code} order by a.article_id desc limit #{limitStart},#{limitEnd}
